Song

Group (2015-present):
iKON

Introduction

Song, formerly known as Yunhyeong, is the lead vocalist and visual center of boy group iKON, he is also a youtuber, chef and model. He originally auditioned at YG Entertainment as an actor, but due to his quick learning skills he was redirected to train as an idol. He participated in the survival show "WIN: Who Is Next" as part of Team B, then competed for a spot on iKON in "Mix and Match."

He modeled for Nivea in 2016 and 2017 (with all members) and in the same year he had her first pictorial with DAZED KR magazine. In 2018 through iKON TV, he was recognized by the group as the "hidden leader" of the group for being the person who takes the most care of the members' health off-camera. He owns a YouTube channel called "Songchelin guide" where he has showcased his cooking skills.

He has participated in variety show such as 'Law of the Jungle in Fuji", "Star Crews On Board" and "Sinsun Nolem", he has also appeared in Yu-ri's cooking channel (SNSD). He had his own content in collaboration with Korea Food Promotion Institute in 2021. His official fanbase is called "SONGNIM" and he named it himself through his youtube channel.

As a solo artist, he has dedicated himself to the trot genre and has 1 unreleased song called "kilkippappa" and his 1st solo song released through iKON's 3rd full album, called "Fighting".
